name: nativescript-datetimepicker
description: A NativeScript plugin for picking date and time.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.vue.reset: cd ../demo-vue && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-datetimepicker && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.prepack: npm i && npm run ngc && npm run build.native
